docs.snippet: Once a swing state in presidential elections, Colorado has teetered on the brink of becoming solidly Democratic. Donald Trump may have pushed it over the edge....
docs.lead_paragraph: Once a swing state in presidential elections, Colorado has teetered on the brink of becoming solidly Democratic. Donald Trump may have pushed it over the edge.

headline.main: Southwest at Risk for Trump After Statements, Slow Start
headline.print_headline: Southwest at Risk for Trump After Statements, Slow Start

docs.snippet: Donald Trump derisively refers to Sen. Elizabeth Warren as "Pocahontas," a taunt rooted in the Democrat's claims of Native American heritage that roiled her 2012 election win in Massachusetts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump derisively refers to Sen. Elizabeth Warren as "Pocahontas," a taunt rooted in the Democrat's claims of Native American heritage that roiled her 2012 election win in Massachusetts.

headline.main: Trump's 'Pocahontas' Attack Rooted in Warren Heritage Issue
headline.print_headline: Trump's 'Pocahontas' Attack Rooted in Warren Heritage Issue

docs.snippet: Just in time for the Cleveland-hosted Republican National Convention this month and as the general election campaign heats up, a new book, "The Bellwether," examines Ohio's importance in picking the nation's president....
docs.lead_paragraph: Just in time for the Cleveland-hosted Republican National Convention this month and as the general election campaign heats up, a new book, "The Bellwether," examines Ohio's importance in picking the nation's president.

headline.main: Book Probes Ohio's Role as National Presidential Bellwether
headline.print_headline: Book Probes Ohio's Role as National Presidential Bellwether
